Text.Page:
{@LinkCreature:77#3008#Varaz} is possibly one of the finest botanists in a century.

Like many Invalesco members, however, he's a thinker, not a fighter.

Also, he needs your help.

Oh, delightful! An assistant!

My mission involves studying the local flora, most of which underwent extensive modification at the hands of the argons.

The good news is that most of the plants don't bite. Sadly, I can't guarantee the same of the argons.

Oh, splended! What fine specimens.

Are you a botanist as well? If you're not, you should consider it.

A few mutated plants from the {@Rgn:46010$$Raga Evala Spire} would be a boon to our research.

If you're headed that way already, why not grab us some?

Oh, splended! What fine specimens.

Are you a botanist as well? If you're not, you should consider it.

I've heard of mutated mushrooms growing in the {@Rgn:46007$$Raga Evala Depths}.

If I had a few to study, I might deduce the argons' use for such things.

Oh, splended! What fine specimens.

Are you a botanist as well? If you're not, you should consider it.

A colleague described some mutated flowers growing in the {@Rgn:46010$$Raga Evala Spire}.

I'd be grateful for some specimens to examine firsthand.
